txtFaq01: Deeplink is a technology that redirects the user to a specific content or platform through their click. This functionality allows you to customize and improve your customer experience.
titFaq02: How Deep Link can increase my results?
txtFaq02:
Imagine you browsing in your social network and got interested in a food advertisement...

When you clicked, you were forwarded for not logged in social network on the browser, much less have easy access to the payment methods you usually use. With so much work, you give up.

Now you tell me, what would happen if after the click you were redirected straight to the food app, with the item already in your cart and need just one click to place the order?

A good entrepreneur knows that shortening the path and lowering barriers to content/conversion is the key to great results.

And this redirect can be used in hundreds of applications like YouTube, Instagram, Spotify, Twitch, iFood, among many others.
titFaq03: Can I know the costumers source with AppClick?
txtFaq03: Yes! You can create various links with the same destination e track precisely where the clicks and conversions is coming.
txtFaq04: Not only could but should! This is the best way to follow your funnel and track all the conversions. Through AppClick you can place pixels on your links and get hot & qualified customers.
